description:
Ayako desperately attempts to befriend a stray cat, but the cat seems determined to hate her. Meanwhile, the other club members seem to have no trouble making friends with the cat and even a strange man named Sekiguchi-san.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kouhai to Hyorori to Neko no Kageboushi
Spindly, Long and Thin, Just as the Silhouette of a Cat, with Kouhai
後輩と ひょろりと猫の 影法師
